
                            
                            <p>，1想去支付宝搜银行卡优惠，看农行有没有20.01-20的卡券。应该都有 <br>  <br> 2，去农行开湖南株洲的二卡或三卡电子账户 <br>  <br> 3，将卡号绑定支付宝，在支付卡券就能看到20券可还xing/用卡 <br>  <br> 4，绑定VX扫月月刷。 <br> PS: <br> &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;一个月不要开2个以上二卡，否则容易风控 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/19/211151eisrpv63vd1w1p31.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/19/211151eisrpv63vd1w1p31.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/19/211152osyaekkainnese7z.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/19/211152osyaekkainnese7z.jpg"> </p>
